channel.title: NHC North Atlantic Wallet 2 - Hurricane Yuri (AL722026)
channel.description: Latest advisories and graphics for Hurricane Yuri (AL72)

image.title: NHC North Atlantic Wallet 2 - Hurricane Yuri (AL722026)

item.title: Summary for Hurricane Yuri (AL2/AL722026)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...YURI LIKELY PEAKED IN INTENSITY... ...CURRENTLY THE STRONGEST TROPICAL CYCLONE RECORDED ON THE PLANET... As of 5:00 PM EDT Thu Oct 24 the center of Kristy was located near 32.0, -34.6 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 787 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 310 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Yuri
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...YURI LIKELY PEAKED IN INTENSITY... ...CURRENTLY THE STRONGEST TROPICAL CYCLONE RECORDED ON THE PLANET...
